txt.en:
'My son's heart is in the right place. The half-orcs have sacked most of our fields, and lurk just outside town. We have held them on the fields, but we will soon find ourselves surrounded.

'If you could take the fight to them, we might be able to start pushing back towards their camp to the north-east.

'Travel to the crofts just outside town, you will find the half-orcs there...or if you don't, they will certainly find you. Go with care.'
'I am glad you have returned, [placeholder]. The half-orcs will taste revenge for the destruction they have wrought.\n\nYou have the thanks of Garsfeld, but as always, there is more to be done!'
Garsfeld has recently been harried by an invading force of Half-orcs. Gísil wishes you to drive them off and reclaim the crofts directly outside of town.
Defeated Half-orcs in the fields of Garsfeld ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Half-orcs in the fields of Garsfeld ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Half-orcs can be found on the crofts surrounding Garsfeld.
Gísil can be found inside the mead-hall of Garsfeld.
